name: Ruby (Husky Game Development, xWolfehhx)
description:
Hello! We're Husky Game Development Enterprise over at Michigan Technological University. At the enterprise, we have students create games throughout their semesters with us. Check out all of our students' games!

Controls: WASD to move; Mouse and left-click to aim and shoot.

Team 12

Jolo Vandenberg - Programmer/Team Lead

Kasey Jackson - Lead Programmer

Ethan Fournier - Programmer/Story

Lilith Moore - Programmer/Art

Maritza Gonzalez - Programmer/Art

Emily Gi - Dialogue/Art
